Data Analytics für Chemieingenieure und Chemiker
first meeting will take place on

The class consists of a lecture (2SWS) and a seminar (2SWS), where the theoretical concepts are applied practically in computer exercises. In the second half of the semester, the students will work in groups on a small research project employing actual research data. The exam consists of a presentation of the group project and an oral exam.
Digitalization in the chemical industry, data science process, descriptive statistics, machine learning, visualization and communication
Programming, data acquisition, data cleaning, data exploration and dashboarding in Python
Application of the theoretical and practical teaching content within the framework of a project
